categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Emarra was a female Human who was a major in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, when she was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.

Major Emarra appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Alderaan Modification Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock, though she was later relabeled as the Level 26 Modification Vendor.
